alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 4:30AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Bayfield and west central Ashland Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 428 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Town of Delta, or 32 miles northeast of Hayward, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts up to 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Benoit around 440 AM CDT. Sanborn around 445 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Barksdale, Ashland, Washburn and Odanah. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. This storm may intensify. Monitor local NOAA Weather Radio, commercial radio, or television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
